means: 未经检查（或调查、审查）的，未经权衡的，未经核对的

sentence.Network_en: An unexamined life is not worth living. -- Socrates.
sentence.Network_cn: 生命未经考验,未算真正活过. —— 苏格拉底.

sentence.Network_en: Facts are terrible things if left spreading and unexamined.
sentence.Network_cn: 信息如果任其泛滥,不加审核,那是可怕的事情.

sentence.Network_en: Two full years of recession have not left many unexamined family expenses.
sentence.Network_cn: 整整两年的经济衰退让许多家庭的开支已经无处可减.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 后者就是常识所指的“语言”，它总是与非语言的必要条件纠缠在一起，使“语言”这个概念处于一种“未经审视”(unexamined)的状态。符 …
苏格拉底的著名论断：“未经省察（unexamined）的生活是不值得过的生活”（《申辩》，38A）导致了第三个悖论——当他说这话时 …
unexamined 未核实unexamined 未经检查的unexcited 未激励的
uneven 参差不齐的unexamined 未核实unexamined 未经检查的

list.abs: Unassimilated beliefs , unexamined ideas , can seem to adopt a life of their own ., 未同化的信念 , 检查的观念 , 会看上去采用它们自己的一种生活.
undressed carcass 未经处理的动物尸体;未去脏的屠体 unexamined carcass 未经检查的屠体 unfit food 不宜食用的食物 unicorn surgeonfish 独角牛  Unio nickliniana.
If unexamined, 如果未经审视，
the unexamined life is not worth living ., 浑浑噩噩的生活不值得过.

auth_sentence.content: In fact, they'll do anything for an unexamined life.
auth_sentence.res_content: In fact, they'll do anything for an unexamined life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In fact, they'll do anything for an unexamined life.

auth_sentence.content: Whether such cosmetics may also produce unintended and potentially harmful effects remains largely unexamined.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whether such cosmetics may also produce unintended and potentially harmful effects remains largely unexamined.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whether such cosmetics may also produce unintended and potentially harmful effects remains largely unexamined.

auth_sentence.content: But it does represent the Cinema of Unexamined Privilege, let's face it.
auth_sentence.res_content: But it does represent the Cinema of Unexamined Privilege, let's face it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But it does represent the Cinema of Unexamined Privilege, let's face it.
